description.intro: Just south of the vehicle stop lies the 4.5-hectare Arboretum Park, a lush living gallery of nature. Wander among 140 species of trees and shrubs, 36 types of medicinal plants, and rare endemic flora such as Uta Onga (Begonia kelimutuensis), Turuwara (Rhododendron renschianum), and Arngoni (Vaccinium varingiaefolium). Spot the Garugiwa and Flores hawk-eagle soaring above, and immerse yourself in the vibrant symphony of life found only in Kelimutu.
description.note: A must-visit for nature lovers, photographers, and anyone seeking a magical forest experience.
